CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1957, pg. 3, reads: "8 Kids and Adults Live Here - Residents say toilet water backs up into this second-floor sink in apartment next to bathroom shown on left. They use baby basin to bathe in because bathrooms are so bad.  Two one- or two-month-old infants lie on couch, shown by arrow.  Note makeshift wiriting [wiring].  Apartment range provides heat."
TitMainTitle: Boy wearing dark turtleneck and shorts with suspenders, standing in domestic kitchen in dilapidated apartment on 1015 Western Avenue, Northside
